results.task_name: Create a project from natural language
results.prompt_sent: Create a new project called "Mobile App Redesign". Set its status to active and add a description: "Complete redesign of the mobile application with new UX patterns." Also add the tags: mobile, redesign, ux.

arguments.name: Mobile App Redesign
arguments.description: Complete redesign of the mobile application with new UX patterns.

results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 565213f938e64eedae4480615b11ce6c. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users cannot log in when their passwords contain special characters.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types (including special characters) are supported in the login system, and regression tests confirm no issues remain.

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 514ee5a295334fb680069f3a4e0af8b5:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests

results.prompt_sent: Mark task c289ebac87df4d47bfe3dddcba16f841 as currently in progress.
Find the workunit called "Fix Login Page Bug" and get its full details including all tasks.

Save a context note on workunit 514ee5a295334fb680069f3a4e0af8b5 recording this decision: we chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure. This is a high-importance architectural decision.

arguments.title: Password Validation Decision
arguments.content: We chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure.

results.prompt_sent: Create a new product asset called "Workunit Mobile SDK" in draft status. It's a software product currently in the development lifecycle stage. Add a description: "iOS and Android SDK for integrating Workunit into mobile applications."

arguments.name: Workunit Mobile SDK
arguments.description: iOS and Android SDK for integrating Workunit into mobile applications.

results.prompt_sent: Show me the details of project 565213f938e64eedae4480615b11ce6c, including how many workunits and assets it has.
Update workunit 514ee5a295334fb680069f3a4e0af8b5: change its priority to urgent, and set its tags to: bug, authentication, critical.

Mark workunit 514ee5a295334fb680069f3a4e0af8b5 as completed. Add completion notes explaining that the password validation was moved to the backend, all special characters now work, and 12 regression tests were added.

arguments.completion_notes: Password validation was moved to the backend. All special characters now work correctly. Added 12 regression tests.
